DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study learn effect integrative therapy chronic recurrent low back pain . The intervention call RESTORE ( Restorative Exercises Strength Training Operational Resilience ) base series gentle stretch strengthen exercise incorporate breath-work mindfulness . The study design discover impact RESTORE pain level , physical function , behavioral health .
DOC.brief_title: Restorative Exercise Strength Training Operational Resilience ( RESTORE ) Chronic Recurrent Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnose low back pain pain score 4 high DVPRS 3 month Male female Age 1868* Able read understand English Understands language , able report current pain level recall event DEERSEligible , Military healthcare beneficiary Provider advise mild moderate exercise Patient unable sit floor two minute unable stand independently Complex Regional Pain Syndrome , Fibromyalgia , Chronic Fatigue Syndrome , Auto Immune diseaserelated pain , chronic medical condition ( i.e . advanced diabetic neuropathy ) preclude consent Patients severe TBI Practiced Yoga within 6 month Presurgical candidate back surgery within 3 month Back surgery within past year Pregnancy** ; female ask selfreport Undergoing Medical Evaluation Board determine discharge
